name: School of FISH
description:
Guide your school of fish to the seaweed but beware of the dangers along the way. Controls: Left mouse button and mouse movement. Created for: Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 Created With:

 Game Engine: Unity 2019.4 LTS
 3D Models created with: Blender 2.9
 Textured with: Substance Painter
 Art created in: Manga Studio 

 Used assets:

 Both Music Tracks from: Ultimate Game Music Collection
 Stick Font from: Google Fonts
DOTweenPro
UMotionPro
FSM: NodeCanvas
